DOC.brief_summary: The goal trial investigate efficacy lifestyle intervention healthy diet physical activity help overweight/obese pregnant woman achieve appropriate gestational weight gain ( GWG ) prepregnancy body mass index ( BMI ) . The goal intervention help woman achieve low bound GWG range recommend Institutes Medicine ( IOM ) give prepregnancy BMI category ( i.e. , 11 lbs obese woman 15 lbs overweight woman ) . The lifestyle intervention deliver via 2 in-person counseling session 11 telephone contact study dietician train motivational interviewing technique . The lifestyle intervention compare usual medical care . Outcomes assess train study personnel approximately 10 week 32 week gestation , within several day delivery 6 month 12 month postpartum .
DOC.brief_title: Appropriate Gestational Weight Gain Overweight/Obese Women
DOC.criteria: Pregnant Pregravid BMI 25 < 40 ( determine measure pregravid weight electronic medical record ) Diabetes Cardiovascular disease Gastrointestinal disease Bariatric surgery Lung disease Thyroid disease Eating disorder Cancer Bed rest Gestational Diabetes current pregnancy Planning get pregnant move within 1 year delivery Substance abuse Serious mental health disorder
